name: The Pillar of Gods
description:
The Pillar of Gods is an exploration game where you explore around different dimensions and fight bosses + get new weapons and items. This game was originally created on Scratch but was converted to HTML so it can be played here.

Have fun!

Also playable at: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/682689104/

Fandom: https://the-pillar-of-gods.fandom.com/wiki/Home

Controls:

[A+D] Move Left+Right

(Or you can use arrow keys)

[Mouse Click] Interact, Use Weapon

[I] Open/Close Inventory

[T] Chat

[Q] Open Settings, [X] Close Settings

[U] Use Healing Potion

[O] Save Game (To delete save, click the trash button at world load.) 

[Y] Use Rise Potion

[0] Open/Close Achievement Window

[1,2,3,4,5,6] Hotkeys

[S] Show Speedruns List [X] Close Speedruns List

PLEASE NOTE: Multiplayer only works on the Scratch version, so if you would like to do Multiplayer you'll have to have a Scratch account and play the Scratch version.

ALSO NOTE: The game does not save if you close the tab. :(  However, in the future, it may be possible.
